explains: n. 【植物】辣根 (Armoracia rusticana)；辣根调味品
wordGroup: horseradish peroxidase [酶]辣根过氧化物酶

sentences.en: Dr Denk, for example, tracks the myriad branches of a single nerve cell using an enzyme from horseradish.
sentences.cn: 比如Denk博士就使用一种从辣根上得到蚁酶来跟踪单个神经细胞无数的分支。

sentences.en: Obviously horseradish isn't designed to be eaten alone, so I try it with its classic partner, a slice of beef.
sentences.cn: 很明显辣根不是用来单独吃的，所以我用了传统的一份搭配——一片牛肉。
